summary: TAKATA RECALL PLUS DRIVERS SEAT BELT WONT RETRACK VERY EASY. BEEN TO WORLD FORD DEALERSHIP IN PENSACOLA AND THEY KEEP TELLING ME TO BRING IT IN NEXT MONTH. IT'S BEEN SINCE JAN THIS YEAR AND STILL NO AIRBAG REPLACEMENT. BEEN IN THERE THREE TIMES SO FAR. PLEASE LET GET THIS FIXED BEFORE SOMEONE GETS HURT OR DEAD....
